level.heading: Uniformity of application and construction.
level.text: In applying and construing this Uniform Act, consideration must be given to the need to promote uniformity of the law with respect to its subject matter among States that enact it.

level.heading: Legislative History of Laws
level.text: For Law 14-296, see notes following ยง 16-1041.

level.heading: Uniform Law
level.text: This section is based upon ยง 8 of the Uniform Interstate Enforcement of Domestic Violence Protection Orders Act. See 9, Pt. 1B, Uniform Laws Annotated, Master Edition, or ULA Database on Westlaw.
